mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_reply (replyseq, boardseq, membername, replytxt, memberid) VALUES (m_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardseq}, #{membername}, #{replytxt}, #{memberid})
mapper.select: SELECT replyseq, boardseq, membername, replytxt, replycnt, to_char(regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as regdate FROM m_reply WHERE boardseq = #{boardseq} ORDER BY regdate ASC
